fields.title: Networks & Maps
fields.content: overview/intro content for BG network graphs and maps; something on how the data was collected?; overview/links to SNA resources?

fields.title: Belfast Group Network graph
fields.content: Force-directed network graph of people connected to the Belfast Group. Nodes are colored by type. Mouse over a label to see the text more clearly.

fields.title: Belfast Group network based on the Group Sheets
fields.content: This graph was generated based on the data of the group sheets themselves: treating the two periods of the group as two separate entities, and inferring connections between the authors and owners of group sheets and the period of the group that a particular document is associated with. The weight of the connection is based on the number of groupsheets owned or authors, and co-authors and co-owners of a particular groupsheet are linked because presumably they attended the group together.

fields.title: Belfast Group - Chord Diagram
fields.content: Chord diagram of people and organizations connected to the Belfast Group. Mouse over labels to see the connections specific to that person or entity; mouse over the smaller, unlabeled sections to see the name.
